title: Locali - Venice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A "conscious convenience store," this neighborhood deli cafe & market offering a full menu of savory sandwiches, including vegan ones with faux meat and vegan cheese. Range of products sold include healthier snacks and chips, bars, cold beverages, chilled and frozen food. This is its 2nd location, opened March 2014, and is larger than its first in LA Hollywood. Tables available for eating-in.
